DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Reduce #yAttack damage taken by #b50%. Reduce #yBlock gained by #b25%. Lose 1 stack when damage is taken.
Flipper Flaps are 0-cost Attack cards dealing 1 damage to a random enemy 2 (3) times. Exhaust.
Food items are a variety of 0-cost Skill cards that grant small bonuses. Exhaust. If Upgraded, counts as twice the amount of food eaten.
Reach certain milestones of Passivity to inflict debuffs. Milestones are reached at every 25% of the enemy's current HP. Once stacks reach 100% of the enemy's current HP, they flee.
